thread.title: Madame Tussauds DC Unveils Never Before Seen Figure Of Heartthrob Actor Zac Efron

author: cbs8
title: Madame Tussauds DC Unveils Never Before Seen Figure Of Heartthrob Actor Zac Efron
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Madame Tussauds Washington D.C.
The Famed DC Attraction Hosted a DJ'd Party Celebrating Efron's 28th Birthday
WASHINGTON , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Madame Tussauds Washington D.C. today unveiled a never before seen figure of Disney-star turned Hollywood leading man, Zac Efron , at an exclusive party celebrating his 28 th birthday. The brand new figure was officially launched by the attraction at a VIP celebration at DC's The Loft at 600 F. The event was inspired by Efron's latest film, We Are Your Friends-- where he plays an aspiring Hollywood DJ.
"We are thrilled to introduce a brand new figure of Zac Efron to the legendary line-up at Madame Tussauds," said Therese Alvich , Regional Manager Madame Tussauds Washington DC. "Zac has continued to gain popularity and is beloved by his fans. We are so happy to offer our visitors the chance to get up close to one of their favorite celebrities."
This is Zac Efron's second Madame Tussauds figure and will be the first to visit Washington DC . In 2009, Zac's inaugural figure was unveiled in London . His newest figure required over 250 precise measurements to capture each detail and was hand-sculpted by a team of 20 Studio Artists. The Madame Tussauds team referenced countless images and videos, creating a more mature and sophisticated Efron. The heartthrob is dressed to impress, styled in a grey fitted suit, perfectly capturing his effortless contemporary yet laidback style.
One lucky fan helped wish the star a happy birthday at the DJ'd celebration thanks to Girls' Life Magazine . This past August, the popular magazine for teen girls held an exclusive contest at their Annual Fashion Bash, providing fans with the chance to win tickets to attend the once in a lifetime opportunity to celebrate with the celebrity.
Madame Tussauds is excited to spread the word via social media channels using #MTDCEfron. Check out the event's hashtag for the latest and greatest from the festivities.
About Madame Tussauds Washington D.C.
Madame Tussauds Washington D.C. is a fully interactive, full-sensory experience, where visitors are able to touch, see and hear major historical events and celebrities in a way unlike any other Washington D.C. attraction. The attraction, highlighted by the Presidents Gallery, which features wax figures of all 44 U.S. Presidents, showcases likenesses of some of the world's most recognized individuals, including: international superstars Angelina Jolie , Brad Pitt , Michael Jackson , Justin Bieber , Taylor Swift , Jennifer Lopez and Rihanna; entertainment and sports giants Oprah Winfrey , Babe Ruth, Johnny Depp and Tiger Woods, among others. For more information, visit www.madametussaudsdc.com or call 202-942-7300.
